extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to V-SFT Ver6
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade from V-SFT Ver5 to V-SFT Ver6 to mitigate vulnerabilities CVE-2024-11799, CVE-2024-11800, and CVE-2024-11801.

extracted_playbook.title: Plan for Future Fixes
extracted_playbook.description: Prepare for the upcoming fix for CVE-2024-11802 and CVE-2024-11803, scheduled for release in May 2025.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Social Engineering Protections
extracted_playbook.description: Educate users to avoid clicking web links or opening attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement ICS Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor and Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to monitor for suspected malicious activity and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
